attributes.title: Do not download!!
attributes.review: I just downloaded this app and it took almost 3 hours to download. At first I thought it was my internet but then I realized it’s the app! I don’t recommend it took so long to download and the app takes so much storage so I do not recommend!!!

attributes.title: Why do we even have this app
attributes.review: To be 100 percent honest the point of this app is useless it give us information about Trumps racist, careless and unprofessional actions. If we really wanted to know what a racist Cheeto Puff has to say we look at his Twitter because he makes his ideals very clear there.

attributes.title: BLACK LIVES MATTER🖤🦋✨
attributes.review: I downloaded this to showed the orange 🍊 that I “liked” him for being a child Predator wanting to banned tik tok being mean to his son,ignoring him making fun of hispanics and African Americans,being racist,calling us thugs and etc, then the app said 🍊  ou’ve 🍊  been 🍊  attacked 🍊  by 🍊  a 🍊 orange 🍊 I hate oranges that’s racist good bye and anonymous 2020✨💕😝

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD🤡🤦‍♀️😡😡😡😡
attributes.review: This is by far the worst app that i have downloaded because when I signed up it was not letting me sign up and I had to ask my granddaughter to help me and she gets bad temper tantrums when I ask her and I ALMOST HAD A HEART ATTACK  because of this stupid app and I love trump but this app was so risky a

attributes.title: This app kind of stinks
attributes.review: I was hoping to find that it would be promoting things that will be beneficial to the USA as a whole. Because I truly care about our country! But I don’t feel like it had anything other than negative opinions. Disappointing 😢

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in an attempt to be a patriotic citizen but everytime I open the app it crashes. It asked to access many personal things and for my number. It also continued to play all star by smash mouth repeatedly.

attributes.title: Absolutely Terrible
attributes.review: Not enough racism. I was promised moare racism. And where’s the homophobia??? I thought that was like the basis of this whole thing???? So there needs to be more of that here too. Overall very low quality, not enough discrimination shown on the app. Very bad representation of his presidency. 💔💔💔

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: i downloaded the app thinking it was gonna  be SO bad, but turns out it worse then i thought😹😷🤢the republican vibes on that app make me SICK👁👄👁it smelled like sweaty😺and greasy pizza. i regret moving my finger to press the download button😽✨anyways, if i could give it a 0 star, i would❤️✨😀😳👁😃😼😼😼😽👄😹😻😾😾😺🤢😂😚😚🤪🤪😷😷💀🥺😈😿

attributes.title: So disappointing 🥵
attributes.review: I expected more from our incredible president Cheeto. The app gave me a headache and I do t think it conveys the right message. Extremely disappointed. Nothing regarding the real issues fake news outlets are not covering like Obamagate. Can’t believe it. 😡

attributes.title: Honest Review
attributes.review: Honestly everything with this app is just terrible....I hate it, but I am so devastated with all the reviews sayings it a good app...If you were thinking about downloading this app just don’t it’s a terrible app and all the reviews with 5 stars are obviously bots or brainless people....Anyways Trump 2020 🇺🇸
